channel.title: Anyone got any Usefull Client TUTS? Read the thread for more
channel.description:
Hey, I'm working on a Spawn Server project with my friend and I was wondering if by any chance anyone has any client tutorials such as making new sprites, adding them in and adding custom buttons in..
Changing sprites is pretty easy, I want to be creative and add a few things of my own so if anyone could help me out please respond.
ask for my Skype if you wish to join the project or atleast teach me a few things personally :)
Thanks.
